episodeName: Best of the Worst Episode 1
subtitle: Action Movies
description: The first episode of Red Letter Media's newest and most successful series since Gamestation 2.0! Watch the comedy and horror as the RLM crew watch and analyze bad movies! This episode features Russian Terminator, Ninja Vengeance, and Never Too Young To Die!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst Episode 3: The Killer Eye, They Bite, and Xtro
subtitle: Three Bewb-filled Creature Features
description: The gang examine and discuss three bewb-filled alien creature features, and accidentally watch a good film in the process.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Deadly Prey, Hard Ticket to Hawaii, and Miami Connection
subtitle: Warm Climes
description: To mentally escape the Hell that is Wisconsin winter, the gang watches three films from 1987 that all take place in warm climates: the Rambo knockoff Deadly Prey, the Andy Sidaris action classic Hard Ticket to Hawaii, and the recently rediscovered Miami Connection.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Wheel of the Worst
subtitle: The Wheel of the Worst 1
description: http://www.redlettermedia.com - We introduce a new device of torture on The Best of the Worst - The Wheel of the Worst. Watch as Mike, Jay, Jessi, and Rich Evans spin the wheel of the worst to randomly select terrible videos to watch and discuss.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Vindicator, Cyber Tracker, Robot Jox, and R.O.T.O.R.
subtitle: Robot Movies
description: After numerous failed attempts with forgettable movies, the gang finally settles in for a robot double feature of Robot Jox and R.O.T.O.R. This episode was shot on a dark and stormy night, and much alcohol was consumed in order to properly come to terms with the madness that is R.O.T.O.R.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Playing Dangerous, Shapeshifter, and Thunderpants
subtitle: Stupid Kids Movies
description: This week on Best of the Worst, the gang tackles misguided children's films. Or what they THOUGHT were children's films anyway.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #2
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 2
description: OMFG! It's Best of the Worst Episode 8. Watch as Jack, Wizard, Rich, and Mike tackle 3 selections off of the Wheel of the Worst! It's horrifying!

moviesData.title: Gary Coleman in For Safety's Sake
The Family Guide to the Internet

episodeName: Best of the Worst: V-World Matrix, The Amazing Bulk, and ????
subtitle: Visual Effects Driven Turds
description: With professional visual effects artist Colin in tow, the gang watches two visual effects-driven turds as well as a mystery movie.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Bloody Birthday, Crazy Fat Ethel II, and Psycho From Texas
subtitle: Slasher Flicks
description: With the help of special guest Gillian, the gang suffers through some of the worst movies on Best of the Worst yet: the worst lil' murderers slasher film Bloody Birthday, Grandma's-home-movie-disguised-as-a-sequel Crazy Fat Ethel II, and the Coen Brother's-esque crime caper Psycho From Texas.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Night Beast, Trick or Treat, and Skull Forest
subtitle: Halloween Episode
description: Happy Halloween! The gang gets dressed up in their finest Halloween attire and watches three horror-filled turds!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #3
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 3
description: It's that time again! Time to spin the Wheel of the Worst! Will the group land on the Shoji Tabuchi show? Or how about Tree Stand Safety. Only fate knows the answer but one thing is for certain: whatever it lands on will make everyone miserable.

episodeName: Best of the Worst Extras: Shark Movies
description:
This is a segment that was cut from the latest episode of Best of the Worst. The full episode is now up on the Red Letter Media website.

Like the gang's Best of the Worst pint glasses? You can order them from the RLM store: http://www.redlettermedia.bandcamp.com

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Playing Dangerous 2, The Exterminator, and The Deadliest Prey
description: It's the first ever Best of the Worst sequel episode! In which the gang watches sequels to movies that have previously been featured. We start off with the baffling Playing Dangerous 2, followed by the revenge thriller The Exterminator (because Exterminator 2 was already watched) and finally the much-anticipated Deadly Prey follow-up, The Deadliest Prey.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Elves, Santa Claus, and Christmas Vacation 2
subtitle: Christmas Special
description: Merry Christmas, everyone! Santa's left the Best of the Worst crew a grouping of films that are the cinematic equivalent to a lump of coal.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Robo-C.H.I.C., Alien Seed, and Yor: The Hunter from the Future
subtitle: Otherworldly Sci-fi Movies
description: The gang watches three 80's sci-fi movies and discover, to their horror, that one is a comedy video. Jay commits suicide live in the video. Rich Evans dies of a heart attack. Mike survives the viewing with mild PTSD and a hangover and Josh learns the magic of Christmas.

moviesData.title: Yor: The Hunter from the Future

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #4
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 4
description: It's back! The Wheel of the Worst returns with a new collection of tapes. What will fate pick for our intrepid heroes this time? Shoji Tobuchi? Dancing Grandmas? Whatever it picks, nobody will be happy.

moviesData.title: Dunkin' Donuts 1994 Fall Donut Event Finishing Video with Bob Rosenberg

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Supergirl, Captain America (1990), and Roger Corman's Fantastic Four
description: Superhero movies don't seem to be going away anytime soon. Let's take a look back at the awkward years of comic book characters being brought to the silver screen with three notorious comic adaptation failures, including the infamous, never-officially-released Fantastic Four movie produced by Roger Corman.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Ninja Movies
subtitle: Ninja Movies!
description: Holy shit! It's a new Best of the Worst featuring ninja movies, a special guest star, AND a NEW torture device for the modern age...the Choose n' Lose!

episodeName: Best of the Worst Special: A Conversation with Len Kabasinski
description: While in town for Best of the Worst and Space Cop, we sat down with Killer Wolf Films' Len Kabasinski to talk about his movies.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #5
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 5
description: The Wheel of the Worst is back! Unfortunately.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Ghetto Blaster, Terror in Beverly Hills, and Killing American Style
subtitle: American Action Movies
description: It's the US vs Canada as the group suffers through three forgotten action films from the late 80s, culminating with Killing American Style -- the long-lost film from Samurai Cop director Amir Shervan.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: High Voltage, Death Spa, and Space Mutiny
subtitle: Battle of the Genres
description: It's Best of the Worst's very first "Battle of the Genres!" In this episode, the group takes an action movie, a horror movie, and a sci-fi movie and pits them against each other to see which shitty movie gets it done the closest to what its genre should be.

episodeName: Regarding Samurai Cop...
description: A lot of people have been letting us know that the actor that played Samurai Cop has recently resurfaced after years of speculation that he had died. Here is our response to those comments.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Shakma, Python II, and Beaks: The Movie
subtitle: When Animals Attack!!!
description: http://www.redlettermedia.com - Holy shit! Look out! It’s animals and they are attacking. Rich, Mike, Jessi, Jack, and I guess Jay watch three amazing attacking animal movies. Get the fuck ready for 50 minutes of non-medy.

episodeName: A Conversation with Samurai Cop star Matt Hannon (part 1 of 2)
description:
Samurai Cop 2 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/samuraicop2/samurai-cop-2-deadly-vengeance

Jay and Mike sit down and talk with Matt Hannon, star of Samurai Cop and the upcoming Samurai Cop 2! 

Http://www.redlettermedia.com

episodeName: A Conversation with Samurai Cop star Matt Hannon (part 2 of 2)
description:
Samurai Cop 2 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/samuraicop2/samurai-cop-2-deadly-vengeance

Part 2 of our discussion with Matt Hannon focuses on what happened after Samurai Cop finished filming.

http://www.redlettermedia.com

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #6
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 6
description: http://www.redlettermedia.com - Oh no! The Wheel of the Worst is back! This time, the gang is joined by their Canadian friends to suffer with.

moviesData.title: How Can I Tell If I'm Really in Love?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Theodore Rex, Carnosaur, Tammy and the T-Rex
subtitle: Dinosaur Movies!
description: http://www.redlettermedia.com - Rawr! The gang revisits some forgotten 90s dinosaur movies!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Item, The Crawlers, and Blood Lock
subtitle: Halloween Spooktacular!!!
description: http://www.redlettermedia.com - Booooo! It's a spooooooky new Halloween-themed Best of the Worst. What horrifying films await the group? Who will survive and what will be left of them?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Star Wars Holiday Special
subtitle: The Star Wars Holiday Special (1978, Color, CBS)
description: Ho ho ho! Merry Times! This Christmas, the Best of the Worst gang gets a giant lump of coal.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #7
subtitle: Wheel of the Worst 7
description: Special Guest star Freddie Williams III joins us on this episode of Wheel of the Worst!!!

moviesData.title: Ice Dams: Causes, Combats, and Cures
How to Become a Teenage Ninja

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Star Wars Holiday Special (FOR REAL)
description: This time, the group actually gets around to talking in depth about the ill-fated 1978 Star Wars Holiday Special.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Alienator, Alien from the Deep, and Hands of Steel
subtitle: Weird Things on the Left Arm Sci-Fi-Extravaganza!!!
description: Rich Evans and three others watch 3 terrible Sci-Fi films!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Blood Debts, The Tomb, and Undefeatable
description: Mike, Jack, Wizard, and Rich Evans watch 3 terrible action movies! What horror awaits them!?

episodeName: Best of the Worst Extra: Backwards VHS footage
description: Here is what actually happens when you reveres the reels on a VHS tape.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #8
description: Jack, Jay, Mike, and Rich Evans all take a spin on the wheel of nightmares and horror. What crap will the they land on or whatever.

moviesData.title: Let's Sing and dance music video

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The New Gladiators, Exterminator 2, and Aftermath
subtitle: Future Dystopian Movies
description: In this sci-fi dystopian schlock episode, Jay, Josh, Jack, and Richard William Thomas Evans III watch three films: The New Gladiators, Exterminator 2, and The Aftermath. Which film will be crowned the Best of the Worst?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Lady Terminator, Lost in Dinosaur World, and Low Blow
description: Colin from Canada joins the gang to watch a terminator film, a film about a theme park filled with dinosaurs, and a movie where an old man punches people.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #9
description: Jim and Colin from Canada are back to help spin the Wheel of the Worst yet again. What magic awaits them????

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Future War, The Jar, and White Fire
description: Oh no! It's a Battle of the Genres episode of Best of the Worst! This episodes features both one of the best movies the group has ever watched on the show, as well as one of the worst. Also, Robert Z'dar wears his best Borg cosplay.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Kiss Meets the Phantom of the Park, Killer Workout, and Mystics in Bali
description: Boooooo! Happy Halloween! For this Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular, the gang watches three totally scary movies that cause Jay to pass out, Rich to piss himself, and Mike to fall asleep: Kiss Meets the Phantom of the Park, David A. Prior's Killer Workout, and Mystics in Bali, which is so scary that the gang can't remember the title.

moviesData.title: Kiss Meets the Phantom of the Park

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Photon Effect, How I Saved the President, and Double Down
description: [Fake] Hidden and utterly disgraced RLM video with the one of who nobody now may speak freely.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: A Very Cannon Christmas
description: It's the holiday season, yet again! Join the Red Letter Media gang as they celebrate by opening presents that contain either shitty Christmas specials or violent 80s action movies made by the good people at Cannon Films!

episodeName: Best of the Worst Episode 37 - Wheel of the Worst 10
description: Mike, Jay, Jack, and Rich Evans spin the wheel and get three terrible films.

moviesData.title: Show Off! How to be cool at parties

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Order of the Black Eagle, Wired to Kill, and Raiders of Atlantis
description: The gang watches three horrible, explosive action movies that all feature someone getting set on fire. Other highlights include baboons driving tanks, the lost city of Atlantis having an unseen motorcycle manufacturing plant, and a woman being mentally abused for the entire run time of a "fun" action thriller.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #1
description: The gang tries out a new random movie selection device, to disastrous results. What movies are selected? Watch and see but here's a hint: they're all the worst possible selections.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #11
description: To recover from the last miserable episode of Best of the Worst, the group decided to utilize the Wheel of the Worst! Because the group  are gluttons for punishment!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Pocket Ninjas, Cyclone, and Dangerous Men
description:
DANGEROUS MEN BLU-RAY: http://amzn.to/1PAguX2

Put on your sweatpants and prepare a pot of coffee because this is gonna be a long night! The gang watches two of the most baffling, nonsensical movies they've ever watched with Pocket Ninjas and Dangerous Men. Cyclone's in there too.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #12
description: The Canadians are back! And what better way to welcome them to the US than by subjecting them to painful, outdated VHS tapes?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #2
description: The Plinketto board is back! Is the Plinkett board replacing Half in the Bag? Is Half in the Bag replacing Best of the Worst? Is the comment section replacing Red Letter Media? Are tired memes replacing even more tired memes?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Parole Violators, Future Force, and Geteven
description: Jay, Mike, and Rich Evans encounter aliens from another country who visit Milwaukee for a short while to drink booze and watch terrible movies only to return to their home country, changed, less human, and more afraid of cinema than they ever have been before.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Scary or Die, Chopping Mall, Exorcist II: The Heretic
description:
CHOPPING MALL bluray: http://amzn.to/2eciYBM

Boooo! It's the 2016 Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular, featuring clown monsters, evil killer robots, and James Earl Jones wearing a giant bug costume!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst 13
description: Mike, Jay, Jack, Josh, and Rich Evans try their luck on the Wheel of the Worst™ but fail on an epic level. They must watch every tape!! Or at least PART of every tape!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: RepliGATOR, Johnson Family Christmas Dinner, and Alligator
description: Happy Holidays! To celebrate the Christmas season, the gang watches one terrible Christmas film and two films about alligators!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Episode 48: Plinketto #3
description: The Plinketto board is back to terrorize the BOTW gang. It's possible with the selections at hand, the ball landed on the worst films possible. Is it fate? Is it the universe telling these losers to get a life? We'll let YOU decide.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Carnosaur 2, The Skateboard Kid 2, and Future Zone
description: The gang watches sequels to previous Best of the Worst movies. This is the second time they've done this, making it a sequel sequel episode.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Biohazard, Slaughter High, and Kill Point
description: Mike, Jay and Rich welcome special guest Freddie Williams to the first ever episode of the Best of the Worst Selection Series, in which Freddie personally selects all three films for the group to watch.

episodeName: Curse of the Worst
description: It's the Curse of the Worst!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #14
description: You thought it was dead. You thought wrong. The gang revives the Wheel of the Worst to torture us all!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Bigfoot vs D.B. Cooper, Black Cougar, and Raw Force
description: Special guest star Len Kabasinski is back on Best of the Worst! This time Mike, Jay, Rich Evans, Jack, and Len watch three terrible films (surprise, surprise) well one is not so terrible after all... CHECK IT THE FUCK OUT!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Hollywood Cop
description: In the first "Spotlight Series" episode of Best of the Worst, the gang takes a look at Hollywood Cop! From the director of Samurai Cop!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #15
description: The Canadians are back! And we've decided to torture them yet again with the dreaded Wheel of the Woooooooorst!!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Sweeper, Empire of the Dark, and Mad Foxes
description:
http://www.redlettermedia.com

Oh no, it's Best of the Worst! This time the group watches three films that were recommended to us by one of our Canadian friends. It's The Sweeper, Empire of the Dark, and a German release of a Spanish movie, Mad Foxes! Oh my Goooood!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Last Vampire on Earth
description: Mike, Jay and Rich Evans are joined by Colin from Canada to discuss the unsung bad movie masterpiece The Last Vampire on Earth, which is in no way "inspired" by Twilight.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #4
description:
I know we've dropped the ball lately with Best of the Worst, but now the gang is back to... drop the ball.. ON PLINKETTO!!! 

What nightmares await!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Vampire Assassin, Hack-O-Lantern, and Cathy's Curse
description: Boooo! It's that time of year again for another Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular! This year, the gang watches the totally-not-a-Blade-ripoff Vampire Assassin, The Halloween-themed slasher film Hack-O-Lantern, and the totally-not-an-Exorcist-or-Omen-ripoff Cathy's Curse. BoooooooOOOooo!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Suburban Sasquatch
description: The group dissects one of their absolute favorite terrible movies, Suburban Sasquatch! The terrifying story of a guy in a shitty gorilla costume ripping rubber arms off terrible actors!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #16
description:
http://www.redlettermedia.com

Games of chance is the theme today! SPIN THAT WHEEL!! Your inbred flyover best friends from the Midwest (that you'll never meet or be friends with) spin a wooden wheel with obscure and terrible videos on it. Watch them watch the tapes! Get drunk! And embarrass themselves! Mike gets to spin twice to redeem himself. Enjoy!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Merry Kick-mas!
description: Ho Ho Ho! The group celebrates Kick-mas by watching some terrible action movies with people kicking on the cover and a terrible animated Christmas special where nobody kicks or does much of anything.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #5
description: The gang is back! And the game is on! Plinketto that is! After learning about the death of Rich Evans, the gang decides to carry on with life as usual. No interruptions with watching bad movies! It’s time to drop the ball… the Plinketto ball and randomly select three pre-selected terrible movies. What films will get picked? You’ll have to watch to find out! Because I already know cause I edited and have already seen the show! But you haven’t! WATCH and see the gang pick movies, watch them, and then discuss their merits OR demerits during the final discussion! Enjoy the fun times had by all watching terrible b-movies!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Black Spine Edition
description: Oh no! Mike has found a new way to torture Jay, Jack, and Rich Evans in this terrifying new episode of Best of the Worst! For years unmarked tapes have sat on the shelf. No one knew what they were.... until now! Enjoy this frightening new episode with a special surprise!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Hologram Man, Faust, and Blood Street
description: The gang watches a Demolition Man/Lawnmower Man ripoff, a Spawn ripoff that turns out to not be a Spawn ripoff, and a Leo Fong movie.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #6
description: A special Guest joins the gang as they drop the Plinketto ball for the 6th time! What horrors await them?!?!!?!?!?!?!?!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Kill Squad, Ryan's Babe, and Demonwarp
description: The gang watches another Cameron Mitchell movie that Cameron Mitchell's barely in but lots of people get kicked, a Canadian-made road trip """"comedy"""" thriller (?), and an alien bigfoot movie. Lives are changed.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #17
description: The Canadians are back! TO SPIN THE WHEEL OF THE WORST!!! Watch them watch videos that represent the worst of humanity!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Night of the Lepus, Zombie 3, and Silk
description: Take a trip down memory lane as Best of the Worst celebrates the 35th anniversary of the release of the first camcorder by filming an entire episode on VHS cameras! You'll laugh. You'll cry. You'll be nauseous from the horribly blown out low grade imagery. The only reprieve would be the fact that all three movies watched are 2K and 4K restorations available on blu-ray, but the movies themselves are just terrible so it doesn't matter.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Lycan Colony
description: It's another Spotlight Episode of Best of the Worst! This time, the gang watches Lycan Colony! A movie about a town full of """""werewolves.""""" AWESOME.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Carnivore, HauntedWeen, and Black Roses
description: Booooo! It's Halloween again, which means the group has gotten together to watch some spooky horror films, including the now-traditional Heavy Metal-themed monster movie. Things got crazy. Then they didn't.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Black Spine Edition #2
Best of the Worst: Plinketto #7
description: The gang is back! This time they are "dropping the ball" on the Plinketto board again! What three moopies will they watch this time? Nothing special about this episode.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Christmas or Cats
description: Merry Cat-mas, friends! To celebrate the holiday, the group watches movies that may be either terrible Christmas films or terrible films about cats. Or maybe both! Ho Ho Ho!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Cybernator, Panther Squad, and Project Metalbeast
description: Special guest star Freddie Williams takes on three terrible movies with Mike, Jay, and Rich Evans. What will happen on the brand new Best of the Worst set?!?!? Probably the same thing that usually happens. Mike drinks too much and bullies people and says outrageous things. Jay also reveals he don't know what a turret is.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #18
description: Oh no! After a six month hiatus, the Wheel of the Worst is back to torture the gang with more horrible VHS tapes that nobody should ever be forced to actually watch. LOOK OUT!

episodeName: Our VHS Collection
description:
Finally! Ever wonder about EVERYTHING on our shelves? Well.... got 36 minutes to spare? Check out this amazing video separated into three generas: Horror, Sci-Fi/Fantasy, and Action as we visually catalog all our VHS tapes. Now you can know what NOT to send us! Because you can see what we have!!! 

Note: This video does not include "miscellaneous" VHS titles, Wheel of the Worst tapes, or DVDs or Blu Rays. THAT'S for another day...

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Spookies, Action USA, and Alien Private Eye
description: Make some popcorn and settle in for an episode where, as it turns out, pretty much all three films could have been Spotlight episodes on their own! Get ready for rubber monsters, nonsensical and unmotivated flying cars, and a clueless alien detective!

episodeName: Our DVD and Blu-ray Collection
description: We have too many movies.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Twister's Revenge
description: Mike, Jay, and Richard Evans "Spotlight" a terrible old movie called "Twister's Revenge" by Wisconsin filmmaker Bill Romaine.

episodeName: Best of the Worst Episode 78
description:
Special thanks to Macaulay Culkin. Check out more of his stuff at
https://bunnyears.com/
https://www.youtube.com/BunnyEarsTube

It's that time again! Time to spin the wheel of the worst! Mack is back with the hacks and the guys watch some terrible videos!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Black Spine Edition #3
description: Oh no! It's another Black Spine episode! This time with a twist. Watch in amazement and horror as the group digs deep into the seedy underbelly of the VHS, along the way learning something about themselves...and each other.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Hawk Jones, Winterbeast, and ROAR
description: The gang is joined again by Mack and Shawn to discuss three wildly different types of insane movies. But most importantly...ROAR!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #8
description: OMG it's another Plinketto! This time, Mike and Jay and the gang are joined by their very special celebrity guest star, Rich Evans! What horrors await???

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Petey Wheatstraw
description: In preparation for the new biopic starring Eddie Murphy, the gang highlights Rudy Ray Moore's weirdest movie!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: The Instructor, Through Doohan's Eye, and Twisted Pair
description: The Canadians are back to discuss James Doohan, Neil Breen, and the longest and most absurd chase scene in movie history!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #20
description:
Oh no, the wheel is back! Christmas has come early! 

And yes, there is a Halloween episode of Best of the Worst coming up soon as well.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Jack-O, Rock n' Roll Nightmare, and Shark Exorcist
description: Happy Halloween everybody! This year, the group watches one of the worst batches of horror movies yet. Beware of Pumpkin monsters, bad hair metal, and Cameron Mitchell!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: A Very Scary Christmas
description: The group watches some "very" "scary" "christmas" "movies" including one of the most famous bad movies ever made!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wicked World
description: It's another spotlight episode! This time on the recently unearthed film Wicked World, from the man who made the all-time classic THINGS. And just to be clear, we didn't alter the editing of the scenes in Wicked World. The way they are presented in this video is how the movie is actually edited!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Black Spine Junka 2
description: Junka is back! This time it's Mack Vs the reigning champion, Jay! Whoever doesn't cause the tower to fall makes the group watch the tapes they pulled from the pile. Or is it the other way around? WHO CARES IT'S JUNKA!!!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Showdown, Robot in the Family, and Bloodz vs. Wolvez
description: The return of Leo Fong! A failed Harry Potter ripoff that wouldn't play in the VCR! A robot in the family! And monster ganstas! This episode has all those things and less!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Bad Movie Scavenger Hunt
description: Best of the Worst is back! This time, the group has created a whole new movie selection gimmick called Garbage Pick. What horrors await? Who will survive and what will be left of them???

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #21
description: The Wheel is back! Again! What tapes will lead to a miserable waste of a day this time around???

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Twin Dragon Encounter, American Rickshaw, and Infested
description: We're back! After spotlights and gimmicks for months, we sat down and just watched three and a half bad movies featuring identical twin Karate instructors, mystical cats, an out of shape alien bounty hunter that sounds suspiciously like a Canadian, and mind-controlling flies!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Shock Em Dead, Hollow Gate, and The Satan Killer
description: Boooooo! It's that time of year again! The time where the Best of the Worst gang drinks a lot of alcohol and laughs about bad movies. Although that's pretty much what they do all year round. But in October, they do it on a flimsy Halloween set!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Ben and Arthur
description: Mike, Jay, Rich Evans, and a special guest star talk about the gay cult classic "Ben and Arthur"!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Christmas 2020
description: Mike, Jay, Tim and Rich Evans watch terrible videos to celebrate a terrible year. When is it time for the coffin?

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Plinketto #9
description: After over a year-long hiatus, the Plinketto board is back to bore and disappoint as always! This time, the gang lands on a different genre for every drop of the ball. It's a Christmas miracle!!!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Blood Shack (aka The Chooper)
description: It's time for another spotlight episode! This time, the guys look back at one of their earliest bad movie night favorites, Blood Shack! Also known as "The Chooper." What's a chooper? You'll just have to watch the episode to find out. Spoiler: you won't find out. We still don't know what the word chooper is supposed to mean.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: LA Wars, Unmasking the Idol, and Robowoman
description:
New Merch Store: http://www.redlettermediamerch.com

This time, the gang watches a gritty action movie about rival crimelords with just a touch of romance, a movie about a British ninja spy and his baboon sidekick stealing gold from a private island, and...Robowoman.

episodeName: Best of the Best of the Worst Montage
description: Hard to believe we've watched 100 episodes worth of utter garbage, Here's a highlight of some of the more memorable movies and VHS oddities we've watched over the years. Be sure to complain in the comments section about what we left out!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Black Spine Plinketto
description:
http://www.redlettermediamerch.com

We finally made it! We've wasted 100 episodes worth of our lives! To celebrate, we decided to do all our various movie-picking gimmicks all in one episode! Come join our misery.

episodeName: Organizing Our Movie Collection
description:
It's tough. We have a lot of crap.
http://www.redlettermediamerch.com

episodeName: Best of the Worst: A*P*E, Easy Kill, and Honorable Men
description: The gang watches three "classic" B-movies. No gimmicks. No guests. Just booze. And Cameron Mitchell. And weird perverts. And Apes. Also, Frank Stallone. Not Frank Malone. But also Pre Malone. Join these middle-aged white men as they tackle such topics as giant Apes, double crosses, cops on film, shoe sniffing, Kirk Cameron, and the CDC's mask requirements. AAAAPE!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Wheel of the Worst #22
description: The wheel is spun thrice! Then the gang must endure bad times as they viewed VHS tapes, CDS, and floppy discs of amusing or non-amusing content. Will they break under the pressure of viewing such materials? Or will they laugh, smile and have great times viewing these visual nightmares of filth. Journey with Mike, Jay, Tim, and Richard "Woggly Balls" Evans as they randomly select a video, movie, DVD, Laser Disc, filmstrip, or other materials and engage in conversations about what they did or did not witness while attempting to be funny. Mike will drink beers. Jay will drink beers. Tim will drink beers. Rich will drink Diet Cokes in an attempt to reduce his girth. Mike will drink too many beers and say things he regrets later in the sober light of daylight. How does this happen? With a Wheel of the Worst, of course! A round object that is spun to randomly select a films. Why does this happen? For entertainment and review purposes only of course!

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Dragon Hunt, Tartarus, and Born into Mafia
description: The gang watches three films made by filmmakers who have had previous films on Best of the Worst before. Will they live up to.... no.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Black Spine Raffle
description: Mike is back to torture the gang with random VHS tapes from a dumpster. This time he's got a new and even more pointless gimmick! Pick a raffle ball to select a tape? Why? Cause these 40 year-old white dudes are emotionally stunted man-children with nothing else to do with their time.

episodeName: Best of the Worst: Halloween Spooktacular 2021
description: Booooo! It's Halloween! You know what that means: a normal Best of the Worst episode except it's on a different set. This time, the gang is stuck in an Evil Dead-esque cabin to talk about three almost-movies, including one from the terrifying director of Shark Exorcist. Oh no!!!!
